NewsArticle.Title: Stratics Chat Today!
NewsArticle.Content:
Stratics will be hosting a brief developer chat with DA Team and Gaiden this afternoon at 2:15 Pacific Time. Have any questions about the exciting, new Dark Ages: Medenia? Now you have a chance to ask!
IRC Chat Servers: irc.frws.com irc2.frws.com irc.glowfish.de
Channel #dahoc
We hope to see you there!
